net.semanticmetadata.lire.impl

Class GenericDocumentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.AbstractDocumentBuilder
      • net.semanticmetadata.lire.impl.GenericDocumentBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentBuilder

    public class GenericDocumentBuilder
extends AbstractDocumentBuilder
    This class allows to create a DocumentBuilder based on a class implementing LireFeature. Date: 28.05.2008 Time: 14:32:15
    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at, sangupta, sandy.pec@gmail.com (fixed null pointer exception)

      • GenericDocumentBuilder

        public GenericDocumentBuilder(java.lang.Class<? extends LireFeature> descriptorClass,
                      java.lang.String fieldName)
        Creating a new DocumentBuilder based on a class based on the interface LireFeature

        descriptorClass - has to implement LireFeature
        fieldName - the field hashFunctionsFileName in the index.

      • GenericDocumentBuilder

      • GenericDocumentBuilder

        public GenericDocumentBuilder(java.lang.Class<? extends LireFeature> descriptorClass,
                      boolean hashing,
                      net.semanticmetadata.lire.impl.GenericDocumentBuilder.HashingMode mode)
        Creating a new DocumentBuilder based on a class based on the interface LireFeature
        Parameters:
        descriptorClass - has to implement LireFeature
        hashing - set to true is you want to create an additional field for hashes based on BitSampling.
        mode - the hashing mode you want to use. default is bit sampling, but there is also a vector based LSH version.

      • GenericDocumentBuilder

        public GenericDocumentBuilder(java.lang.Class<? extends LireFeature> descriptorClass,
                      boolean hashing)

      • GenericDocumentBuilder

        public GenericDocumentBuilder(java.lang.Class<? extends LireFeature> descriptorClass,
                      java.lang.String fieldName,
                      boolean hashing)
        Creating a new DocumentBuilder based on a class based on the interface LireFeature
        Parameters:
        descriptorClass - has to implement LireFeature
        fieldName - The hashFunctionsFileName of the field, where the feature vector is stored.
        hashing - set to true is you want to create an additional field for hashes based on BitSampling.

      • GenericDocumentBuilder

        public GenericDocumentBuilder(java.lang.Class<? extends LireFeature> descriptorClass,
                      java.lang.String fieldName,
                      GenericDocumentBuilder.Mode mode)
        Creating a new DocumentBuilder based on a class based on the interface LireFeature
        Parameters:
        descriptorClass - has to implement LireFeature
        fieldName - the field hashFunctionsFileName in the index.
        mode - the mode the GenericDocumentBuilder should work in, byte[] (== Mode.Fast) or string (==Mode.Slow) storage in Lucene.
